text: Nabiyow Cus, Yalli Nabii Qiisak Qiisaw atu Rooci-luk Qaraanâ fanah fayya koo heeyyooh Qumri kok yamurruqe waqdi koo Qiddeyyooh tama koroositeh yan marak koo cateyyooh koo Naggoyseyyo, ku-diinil koo kataate maray Nabii Mucammad zsa Rubsuma waqdi kaa Nummaysa koroosite marak Amol heenno Qhiyaamah Ayrô fanah, tohuk lakal gacim siinik inkih yoo fanah Akke-le, tokkel isin Qiisâ caagidik itta elle waak Sugeenimik sin fan mekleyyo iyye Yalli
